p: The wild-type HCMV strain, Hi91, was isolated from the urine of an AIDS patient with HCMV retinitis, as described previously [ 20]. HCMV strains Davis and Towne were received from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) (Manassas, VA, USA). Virus stocks were prepared in HFFs maintained in minimal essential medium (MEM), supplemented with 4% fetal calf serum (FCS). The U1, U59, and U75 are patient isolates, which were isolated as previously described [ 20, 21]. Virus stocks were prepared in HFFs maintained in MEM supplemented with 4% FCS.
